casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Percell Blakeney (12187)

Foti, Hennessy and Cretella, Js.

Argued December 12, 1994 decision released January 3, 1995 Percell Blakeney, pro se, the appellant (defendant). James M. Ralls, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and David Strollo, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
